file_content.text: Minor damage to left tertiary servomotor. Functions are not impaired.
For a droid, you're a bad liar. Come on.
Multiple life-forms approaching.
Life-form approaching.
Legate? I thought you were supposed to be at the shield controls?
Turns out our leader needed reinforcements.
Ardun changed his mind.
Has unexpected opposition been encountered?
Comms have been spotty since we got inside, but I didn't hear anything.
How convenient. People die easier when they don't know you're coming.
Good to know. [Attack]
No. Damn it, not now--Wheel, go!
Forget that. Why are you two in here?
What are you doing?
We're on our way to the sublevels. Hunter thinks there might be a master switch for the defenses.
You... really should get back. We can handle ourselves.
I promise, I'm not here to cause trouble.
Don't worry about me.
Wheel?
Establishing linkup. Confirming orders.
Orders confirmed. Code name Legate was to remain with the shield controls.
I knew there was something wrong with you. Ever since Chance died.
Take her down; we'll question her later.
Take him down; we'll question him later.
Yeah... all right. Chance believed in you. Said you saved him on Taris.
Ardun needs me in there, not sitting on the sidelines. You and I both know that.
I want to do my part. Please.
Huh. He likes to play cautious, when it comes to his people. Can't stand to see anyone hurt.
Wheel? Toss our friend some supplies.
We retrieved these from a storage unit. They may prove useful.
Get moving. Master Kothe thinks we can end the war, let's end the war.
Why don't you show me your moves? Just this once, before I kill you.
Let's see. [Attack]
My name isn't Legate, and I don't take orders from the Republic.
Stupid SIS agent. [Attack]
No--Wheel, call Master Kothe now! Go!
Hold it right there.
Code name Saber to code name Legate. We've been waiting for your all-clear--everything alright?
Things are going surprisingly well.
Better than ever.
Glad to hear it--you're part of the team, and we worry.
Everything's fine. Is Ardun Kothe there?
Where's your boss?
It takes time to shore up relationships inside the Empire. I can't be constantly answering to you.
I've been keeping my cover.
I've done undercover jobs, Legate. Three months as a collaborator in the Ryloth slave pits... it's rough.
Master Kothe has another mission for you. He wants you heading to the Hoth system, soon as possible.
Contact him once you arrive. Saber out.
Good to see you here.
